ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_SILTY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A fine and powdery soil found on most worlds. A raw ingredient of glass.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_CLAY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A dense and solid soil found on most worlds. A raw ingredient of bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_PEATY_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A loose soil made of decayed organic matter, found on most worlds. A terrible fuel in this form.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_SILTY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A fine powdery soil compressed into a solid block. An ingredient of glass.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_CLAY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A dense and solid soil compressed to form a building material. An ingredient of bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_SOIL_PEATY_COMPACT_DESCRIPTION: A processed organic-based soil. Can be burnt as fuel.
ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_METAMORPHIC_BASE_DESCRIPT: A rock formed under extreme heat and pressure. Ingredient for basic tools, machines and furniture.
ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_IGNEOUS_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A rock made from cooled magma. A raw ingredient for basic tools, machines and furniture.
ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_SEDIMENTARY_BASE_DESCRIPT: A rock formed from layers deposits. A raw ingredient for basic tools, machines and furniture.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_METAMORPHIC_STONES_WALL_D: A wall made from metamorphic rock stones. Used for building.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_IGNEOUS_STONES_WALL_DESCR: A wall made from igneous rock stones. Used for building.

ITEM_TYPE_ROCK_SEDIMENTARY_STONES_WALL_D: A wall made from sedimentary rock stones. Used for building.

ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_TWISTED_TRUNK_DESCRIPTION: A sinewy wood. An ingredient for sticks or timber.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TRUNK_DESCRIPTIO: A young irregular wood. An ingredient for sticks or timber.

ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_ANCIENT_TIMBER_DESCRIPTIO: Cut ancient wood. An ingredient for tools, machines and furniture.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSTROUS_TIMBER_DESCRIPTI: Cut lustrous wood. An ingredient for tools, machines and furniture.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_LUSH_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: Lovely leaves originating from Wales. Not useful for much, but they look pretty.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_EXOTIC_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: Frondy leaves. Not useful for much, but they look pretty.
ITEM_TYPE_WOOD_WAXY_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: Smooth and thick leaves. Not useful for much, but they look pretty.

ITEM_TYPE_METAL_GOLD_REFINEDCRAFTED_DESC: A refined metal block made from gold.  It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_TITANIUM_REFINEDCRAFTED_: A refined metal block made from titanium.  It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_COPPER_COMPACTCRAFTED_DE: A compacted block of metal made from copper. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_IRON_COMPACTCRAFTED_DESC: A compacted block of metal made from iron. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_SILVER_COMPACTCRAFTED_DE: A compacted block of metal made from silver. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_GOLD_COMPACTCRAFTED_DESC: A compacted block of metal made from gold. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_METAL_TITANIUM_COMPACTCRAFTED_: A compacted block of metal made from titanium. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_DARKGLASS_DEFAULT_BASECRAFTED_: A dark, translucent block made from dark glass. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_CRYSTAL_GLEAM_REFINEDCRAFTED_D: A bright, crystallized block made from gleam. It can be used as a construction block or crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_WARP_CONDUIT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Place blocks on top of each other to create a warp. Interact with the blocks after they are placed to open the warp.
ITEM_TYPE_PORTAL_CONDUIT_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: Place blocks on top of each other to create a portal. Interact with the blocks after they are placed to open the portal.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKMETAMORPHIC_: A crafting ingredient required to make metamorphic bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKIGNEOUS_DESC: A crafting ingredient required to make igneous bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MIXTURE_BRICKSEDIMENTARY_: A crafting ingredient required to make sedimentary bricks.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_SOFT_DESCRIPTION: A small combustible black rock which can be used as a fuel source.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A solid combustible black rock which can be used as a slow burning fuel source.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COAL_HARD_DESCRIPTION: A dense chunk of combustible black rock, which can be used as a long lasting fuel source.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A piece of rock containing the metal copper. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A piece of rock containing the metal iron. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A piece of rock containing the metal silver. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A piece of rock containing the metal gold. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ORE_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTION: A piece of rock containing the metal titanium. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_COPPER_DESCRIPTION: A nugget of impure copper. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_IRON_DESCRIPTION: A nugget of impure iron. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_SILVER_DESCRIPTION: A nugget of impure silver. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_GOLD_DESCRIPTION: A nugget of impure gold. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_TITANIUM_DESCRIPTIO: A nugget of impure titanium. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_SILVERALLOY_DESCRIP: An ingot of refined silver. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_GOLDALLOY_DESCRIPTI: An ingot of refined gold. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_METAL_TITANIUMALLOY_DESCR: A durable alloy made from titanium. It can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTIO: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be amethyst.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTION: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be diamond.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_EMERALD_DESCRIPTION: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be emerald.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be topaz.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be ruby.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTIO: An unpolished stone containing what appears to be sapphire.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ROUGH_OORTSTONE_DESCRIPTI: A decent-sized piece of rock containing the rare Oort stone. A primary ingredient in the Oort Shard crafting recipe.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_STICK_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A small, thin piece of wood which can be used as a crafting ingredient.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_VERDANTGRASS_DESCRIP: Seed from a plant. Place seeds in the ground to grow plants.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_BARBEDGRASS_DESCRIPT: Seed from a plant. Place seeds in the ground to grow plants.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SEED_GNARLEDGRASS_DESCRIP: Seed from a plant. Place seeds in the ground to grow plants.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEAF_FIBROUS_DESCRIPTION: A thick, stringy leaf which can be used to extract fibres.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_LEAF_INKY_DESCRIPTION: An oily leaf which can be used to extract ink.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SAP_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A nutritious liquid which can be found in trees.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BONE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: Skeletal bone from a creature, which can be used to create glue and other materials.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOOD_MEATRAW_DESCRIPTION: A chunk of raw meat from a creature. Cooking the meat will bring out its healing properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOOD_MEATCOOKED_DESCRIPTI: A piece of cooked meat from a creature. Consuming the item will restore a good portion of health.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_TALLOW_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A rendered form of fat. It can be used a cheap fuel source to generate light.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BLOOD_DARK_DESCRIPTION: Blood from rarer creatures. Used for crafting advaced weapons and tools.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOOD_STARBERRYRAW_DESCRIP: A tasty fruit, which restores a little health if consumed. Cooking it improves its healing properties.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOOD_STARBERRYCOOKED_DESC: A cooked starberry, which heals a portion of health if consumed. Tastes good when mixed with meat.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_BREW_HEALING_DESCRIPTION: A refreshing drink which replenishes all health if consumed.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EXTRACT_INK_DESCRIPTION: Traditional ink used for writing signs.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EXTRACT_FIBRE_DESCRIPTION: Thin fibres woven together to create sheets of cloth.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EXTRACT_BONE_DESCRIPTION: Compounds and minerals extracted from bones.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_EXTRACT_FOSSIL_DESCRIPTIO: Rich minerals extracted from ancient fossils. A key ingredient in advanced tool crafting.
A key crafting ingredient for advanced tools.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_GLUE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A key crafting ingredient for furniture and decorations.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_NAIL_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A key crafting ingredient for furniture and decorations.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_COG_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A key crafting ingredient for Locks and Spark Cores.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_SHARD_OORT_DESCRIPTION: A crystalline manifestation of Oort energy. Oort Shards are required to fuel and power portals as they contain enough energy to make portal travel possible.
ITEM_TYPE_LOCATION_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: Contains co-ordinates for a location which can be sold or given to other players.
ITEM_TYPE_PORTAL_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: Place the Portal Token in a valid portal to set the portal's destination
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOSSIL_SMALL_DESCRIPTION: The lithified remains of a small creature long deceased. Fossilized ingredients can be extracted from the item.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOSSIL_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION: The lithified remains of a creature long deceased. Fossilized ingredients can be extracted from the item.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_FOSSIL_LARGE_DESCRIPTION: The lithified remains of a large creature long deceased. Fossilized ingredients can be extracted from the item.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_COMPONE: An artifact from an age long forgotten. It is a key component for creating crafting machines.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_DEVICE_: An artifact from an age long forgotten. It is a key component for creating crafting machines.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_ANCIENTTECHNOLOGY_FRAGMEN: An artifact from an age long forgotten. It is a key component for creating crafting machines.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_OORT_ELEMENT_DESCRIPTION: A key crafting ingredient for advanced tools.
ITEM_TYPE_ITEM_MEAT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A chunk of raw meat from a creature. Cooking the meat will bring out its healing properties.
ITEM_TYPE_POWERUP_SLINGBOW_BASE1_DESCRIP: A crystal that can be fitted into a slingbow, making it do more damage. The crystal is destroyed once all of its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_POWERUP_SLINGBOW_BASE2_DESCRIP: A crystal that can be fitted into a slingbow, making it fire explosive shots. The crystal is destroyed once all of its charge is used up.
ITEM_TYPE_POWERUP_SLINGBOW_BASE3_DESCRIP: A crystal that can be fitted into a slingbow, making it more powerful. The crystal is destroyed once all of its charge is used up.

ITEM_TYPE_POWERUP_LANCE_BASE1_DESCRIPTIO: A crystal that can be fitted into a lance, making it more powerful. The crystal is destroyed once all of its charge is used up.

ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRAFTINGTABLE_BASE_DES: A wooden crafting table, which can be used to craft new items.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_WORKBENCH_BASE_DESCRIP: Place the workbench blocks together to build it. The workbench can be used to craft more advanced items.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_EXTRACTOR_BASE_DESCRIP: The extractor can be used to extract raw materials from items.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_COMPACTOR_BASE_DESCRIP: The compactor condenses materials to create solid items.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_MIXER_BASE_DESCRIPTION: The mixer is a device that homogeneously combines ingredients together to form a new material.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_REFINERY_BASE_DESCRIPT: The refinery is a production machine which converts raw materials into products of value.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FORGE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: The forge can be used to upgrade tools and weapons with special properties.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_POWERCORE_BASE_DESCRIP: The Spark Core is a fuel cell which can be used to store Sparks. Add raw fuel materials to increase the number of sparks stored.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_PIPE_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A Spark Cord is used to connect power to a machine from a Spark Core.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FIREPIT_STONE_DESCRIPT: The base of a furnace. Place the crucible on top to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FIREPIT_IRON_DESCRIPTI: The base of a furnace. Place the crucible on top to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_FIREPIT_TITANIUM_DESCR: The base of a furnace. Place the crucible on top to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_STONE_DESCRIP: The top of a furnace. Place on top of a fire pit to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_IRON_DESCRIPT: The top of a furnace. Place on top of a fire pit to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_CRUCIBLE_TITANIUM_DESC: The top of a furnace. Place on top of a fire pit to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_MACHINE_ENGINE_FORGE_DESCRIPTI: The top of a furnace. Place on top of a fire pit to complete the furnace.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_SOLID_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A decorative door. Doors can be used to keep out unwanted guests.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_WINDOWED_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A decorative door with a window. Doors can be used to keep out unwanted guests.
ITEM_TYPE_DOOR_SOLID_TRAP_DESCRIPTION: A decorative horizontal door. Doors can be used to keep out unwanted guests.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_BASE_DESCRIP: A useful block to store items.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTAINER_STORAGE_SHELF_DESCRI: A useful shelf to store items and put them on display
ITEM_TYPE_FURNITURE_PLINTH_BASE_DESCRIPT: Decorative plinth, which can be crafted into a buying or selling plinth.
ITEM_TYPE_SHOP_PLINTH_BUYING_DESCRIPTION: A buying plinth is used to buy items from other players.
ITEM_TYPE_SHOP_PLINTH_SELLING_DESCRIPTIO: A selling plinth is used to sell items to other players.
ITEM_TYPE_LOCK_DEFAULT_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A lock can be used to stop other players from using doors and machines.
ITEM_TYPE_CONTROL_BEACON_BASE_DESCRIPTIO: Claim an area as your own by placing the Beacon in an unclaimed zone. Items placed inside a Beacon will be safe from other players and world regeneration.
ITEM_TYPE_ARROW_DESCRIPTION: A small wooden arrow which deals piercing damage to a single target. Arrows should be assigned to a slingbow.
ITEM_TYPE_HEALING_ARROW_DESCRIPTION: A small arrow which heals a single target. Arrows should be assigned to a slingbow.
ITEM_TYPE_EXPLOSIVE_ARROW_DESCRIPTION: An explosive arrows which deals damage to all objects where it detonates. Arrows should be assigned to a slingbow.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_BASE_DESCRIPTION: A small wooden torch, which emits a small amount of light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_IMPROVED_DESCRIPTI: A wooden torch, which emits a decent amount of light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_AMETHYST_DESCRIPTI: A torch powered by an amethyst gem, emitting a pink light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_DIAMOND_DESCRIPTIO: A torch powered by a diamond gem, emitting a white light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_EMERALD_DESCRIPTIO: A torch powered by an emerald gem, emitting a green light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_TOPAZ_DESCRIPTION: A torch powered by a topaz gem, emitting an orange light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_RUBY_DESCRIPTION: A torch powered by a ruby gem, emitting a red light.
ITEM_TYPE_LIGHT_TORCH_SAPPHIRE_DESCRIPTI: A torch powered by a sapphire gem, emitting a blue light.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_TOTEM_DESCRIPTION: A basic Oort tool which can be used to gather resources. The totem can be turned into a new item by adding an upgrade.
ITEM_TYPE_TOTEM_AMMO_DESCRIPTION: Assign to a totem to enable warp location picking for a single use.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_LIGHT_CUBE_DESCRIPTION: A basic Oort light tool, which can be used as a light source.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BEACON_PLOT_ADD_DESCRIPTI: The Beacon Plotter tool can be used to add Land Plots to extend a Beacon.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_BEACON_PLOT_REMOVE_DESCRI: The Beacon Plot Remove tool can be used to remove unwanted Land Plots from a Beacon.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_WARP_PICKER_DESCRIPTION: The warp location picker can be used to select a target destination.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_HAMMER_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A wooden hammer, which is most effective against rock type blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_SHOVEL_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A wooden shovel, which is most effective against ground type blocks.
ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_WOOD_DESCRIPTION: A wooden axe, which is most effective against tree type blocks.

ITEM_TYPE_TOOL_AXE_STONE_DESCRIPTION: An axe made from stone. It is most effective against tree type blocks.
